questions.question: Find fejlen: My old father and mother lives in Spain's beautiful capital.

choices.answer: Kongruens-fejl. Father and mother LIVE.
Kongruens-fejl. Father and mother LIFE.
Stavefejl: "beautiful" skal være "beautifull"
Stavefejl: Spain skal være med småt startbogstav.

questions.question: Find fejlen: Every summer worked he hard at the factory.

choices.answer: Forkert ordstilling: "Every summer HE WORKED hard..."
Adjektiv/adverbium-fejl:"...worked he hardLY at the factory"
Forkert præposition: "...hard ON the factory"

questions.question: Find fejlen: Since my father lost his job at the factory, everything have gone uphill.

choices.answer: Stavefejl: "...everything have gone UP HILL."
Stavefejl: "Since my father LOOST."
Kongruensfejl: "Since my father LOSTS his job..."
Kongruensfejl: "...everything HAS gone uphill."

questions.question: On New Years Eve, John and his sister were very excited about the fireworks.

choices.answer: Kongruensfejl: "John and his sister WAS"
Fejl i apostrof/genitiv: "On New YeaR'S Eve..."
Fejl i apostrof/genitiv: "On New YearS' Eve..."
Stavefejl: "John and his sister WHERE..."

questions.question: Find fejlen: They were worried about that they had not seen the cat for four days

choices.answer: Kongruensfejl: "They WAS worried about that..."
Fejl i præposition: "...the cat IN four days."
Præposition + "that" er forbudt:"..about THE FACT that.."
Stavefejl: "They WHERE worried.."

questions.question: Find fejlen: In January and February go many people on package holidays.

choices.answer: Stavefejl: "in january and february" (små bogstaver)
Forkert ord: "...go MUCH people on package holidays."
Kongruensfejl: "..GOES many people on package holidays".
Forkert ordstilling:"...many people GO on package holidays".

questions.question: Find fejlen: He wishes to apologise for that he left her forty years ago.

choices.answer: Kongruensfejl: "He WISH to apologise.."
Præposition + "that" forbudt:"apologise for THE FACT that.."
Forkert bøjning af verbum: "...that he LEAVED her...".

questions.question: Find fejlen: On next monday is it their twentieth anniversary as a married couple.

choices.answer: Stavefejl: "twentieth ANNIVARSARY as a married couple."
Forkert pronomen: "is it THEIRS twentieth anniversary..."
Forkert ordstilling: "On next monday IT IS their..."
Stavefejl i ubestemt artikel: "...as AN married couple"

questions.question: Find fejlen: Luckily became he a good and caring father

choices.answer: Forkert bøjning af verbum: "Luckily he BECOMED a good and.."
Fejl i adjektiv/adverbium: "LUCKY became he a good and..."
Fejl i adjektiv/adverbium: "...a WELL and CARINGLY father"
Forkert ordstilling: "Luckily HE BECAME a good and ..."

questions.question: Find fejlen: Cindy is a ten-year old girl which hates her school intensely.

choices.answer: Kongruensfejl: "...which HATE her school intensely"
Fejl i adjektiv/adverbium: "...her school INTENSE"
Forkert henførende stedord:"..girl WHO hates her school.."

questions.question: Find fejlen: It is often claimed that men think more logical

choices.answer: Kongruensfejl: "...that men THINKS more logical".
Fejl i adjektiv/adverbium: ..."men think more LOGICALLY"
Kongruensfejl: "It ARE often claimed that men think more.."

questions.question: Find fejlen: He falled in and out of sleep

choices.answer: Forkert bøjning af uregelmæssigt verbum: "He FELL in and..."
Forkert bøjning af uregelmæssigt verbum:"He FELLED in and.."
Forkert bøjning af uregelmæssigt verbum: "He feelt in and.."

questions.question: Find fejlen: She has always been interesting in architecture

choices.answer: Fejl i adjektiv: "...INTERESTED in architecture"
Stavefejl: "..in ARKITEKTURE".
Kongruensfejl: "She HAVE always been interesting in..."

questions.question: Find fejlen: I am better at Spanish then you are.

choices.answer: Stavefejl: "..THAN you are".
Stavefejl: "spanish" (lille forbogstav)
Kongruensfejl: "...then you is".

questions.question: Find fejlen: Addicted World of Warcraft players often fail to eat or sleep probably

choices.answer: Stavefejl: "ADDICTIED World of Warcraft players..."
Kongruensfejl: "...players often FAILS to eat or sleep..."
Stavefejl/forkert ord: "..to eat or sleep PROPERLY"

questions.question: Find fejlen: Howard has some mentally problems that he has never dealt properly with.

choices.answer: Adjektiv/Adverbium-fejl: "Howard has some MENTAL problems.."
Kongruens-fejl: "Howard HAVE some mentally problems that..."
Kongruensfejl: "..that he HAVE never dealt properly with"
Stavefejl:"..problems that he has never dealt PROBABLY with"

questions.question: Find fejlen: They leaved me with no explanation

choices.answer: Forkert bøjning af uregelmæssigt verbum: "They LEAFT me.."
Forkert bøjning af uregelmæssigt verbum:"They LEFT me.."
Stavefejl: "They leaved me whit no explanation"
Stavefejl: "They leaved me with no EXPLENATION"

questions.question: Find den korrekte oversættelse: Det lykkedes hende ikke at nå toget

choices.answer: "She did not succeed in catching the train"
She succeeded not in catching the train"
"She did not get on the train"

questions.question: Oversæt: Den eneste, der elsker mig, er min mor.

choices.answer: "The only one which loves me is my mother"
The only one that loves me is my mother"
The only one who loves me is my mother"
The only one who love me is my mother"

questions.question: Hvad er den korrekte forklaring på kongruensfejl?

choices.answer: Uoverenstemmelse mellem subjekt og objekt i en sætning.
Uoverenestemmelse mlm subjekt & verbum i en sætning i nutid.
Uoverstemmelse mellem verberne i en sætning.
Uoverstemmelse mellem subjekt og objekt i en sætning i datid

questions.question: Hvad er et adjektiv?

choices.answer: Ordklassen, der beskriver substantiver:"a NICE, BLACK horse"
Ordklassen, der beskriver verber: "she speaks English WELL"
Ordklassen,der siger noget om handling:"he JUMPS and LAUGHS"

questions.question: Hvilke ord er adverbier?

choices.answer: well, sadly, tomorrow, luckily, loudly, sweetly, kindly
Unfortunatly, often, now, yet, clearly,
black, white, red, orange, happy, high, low, brilliant
horse, dog, table, girl, boy, man, cracker, fire, biology

questions.question: Hvilken gruppe ord er uregelmæssige verber?

choices.answer: To say, think, believe, understand, forget, teach, run, sing
to jump, to paint, to dress up, to love, to hate
To react, to respond, to learn, to establish, to invent

questions.question: Hvilke sætninger indeholder afvigelser fra standard engelsk? (ift. stilistik-opgaven)

choices.answer: "I got suspended from school cause I'm pregnant".
"I've never seen anything like that in my entire life"
"She'd been having a rough time the past ten years".
"He did not give a tiny rat's ass about English homework"
